Visualizations
```{r}

# Upload Data 
df <- read.csv(text=getURL("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SuLab/TSRI-CBB/master/CBB-Metadata/TSRI%20CBB%20Listserv%20-%20Intros-Metadata.csv")) 
summary(df) # Quick view of data

# Word cloud of 'Topics' column
require(devtools)
install_github("lchiffon/wordcloud2")
library(wordcloud2)

library(dplyr)
test<-df$Topics
wordcloud2(test, size=1.6)

test <- df$Topics %>%
  na.omit() %>%
  as.character() %>%
  strsplit(" ") %>%
  unlist() %>% 
  table() %>%
  sort(decreasing = TRUE)
test <- data.frame(test)



sys.plot <- ggplot(sys, aes(x = category, y = value, fill = category)) +
  geom_boxplot() + # Creates boxplots
  geom_point() + # Adds data points
  labs(x="", y = "Nocturnal systolic blood pressure (mm Hg)") + # Labels axes
  theme(legend.position = "none") # Removes automaticlaly included legend
sys.plot # View of plot
```
